edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.external.actions
Class SMSService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.external.actions.SMSService

public class SMSService
extends Service

This class automatically sends SMS when it receives SMS intent created by SendSmsAction class.

onBind

public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)
Returns:

onStart

public void onStart(Intent intent,
                    int startId)
This method sends SMS by using an intent created by SendSmsAction class This method is automatically called by onCreate method when service starts

Parameters:
parameter - List of required parameters:
  1. Intent: intent created by SendSmsAction class
  2. startId : A unique integer representing this specific request to start
